articles.description: Construction of the Nord Stream 2 gas pipeline wrapped up earlier this month, with German regulators now working to approve its commissioning. Once up and running, the pipeline will be able to deliver up to 55 billion cubic metres of gas...

articles.title: Physicists probe light smashups to guide future research: Understanding photon collisions could aid search for physics beyond the Standard Model - Science Daily
